markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=1717)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 363 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Reposition](/Actions.aspx?ID=2379), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) the target using a spell attack roll instead of an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check.
name: Telekinetic Maneuver

</summary>

text: Telekinetic Maneuver Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 363 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Range 60 feet Target 1 creature --- With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Disarm, Reposition, Shove, or Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.
